about.title: About Me
about.text: I'm a web developer passionate about creating unique and functional digital experiences. With experience in Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, Tailwind, SASS, and HTML5, I strive to combine attractive design with efficient code to create innovative and high-impact web solutions.
